lead_paragraph: Rather than lament blowing yet another third-period lead, Ryan O'Reilly and the Buffalo Sabres finally did something about it.
snippet: Rather than lament blowing yet another third-period lead, Ryan O'Reilly and the Buffalo Sabres finally did something about it....

headline.main: Anti-Black Slur in Stamford Is Painted Over After Two Months
